name: Nebulon (Kitchen Games)
description:
The Browser Version of this game might lag, run slower or even crash for some reason. 

In these cases, please consider downloading  the desktop version.

Also global highscores are only available in Windows version

Thank you <3

Rules:

  • When you move, time speeds up. When you stand still, time slows down.
  • Dash through enemy Bullets to get some for yourself
  • Dont let the timer run out!

Controls:

Move WASDDash Right mouse buttonShoot Left mouse button

Tipps:

  • Play the levels and the tutorial first
  • Dashing through yellow bullets wont give you a shot
  • take a look on the global highscores
